meanings.definition: A unit of explosive power equivalent to one million tons of TNT.
meanings.sent1: The military used a megaton bomb to destroy the target.
meanings.sent2: The explosion was so powerful, it felt like a megaton of force.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped a megaton of books on the floor!
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like a megaton bomb waiting to explode.
meanings.sent5: The impact of the crash was like a megaton of energy hitting us.

meanings.definition: A very large amount or quantity.
meanings.sent1: She had a megaton of homework to finish before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: The company produced a megaton of products to meet the demand.
meanings.sent3: I ate a megaton of ice cream at the party!
meanings.sent4: His wealth was like a megaton of gold coins piled up.
meanings.sent5: The crowd cheered with a megaton of excitement at the concert.
